topics.body:
In case no one's said it yet welcome to derpibooru kym mods.


Most common topics of this thread:
1)Penis
2)Willies
3)$5 foot longs
4)Huge tracts of land
5)Drama
6)Everyone shipping Squiggy and Mario
7)Quotes about Revengeance are just one of the *RULES OF NATURE* of derpibooru.
8)Weeb stuff
9)Random things going on in the world



I'm uc9 and most common things I'll talk about:
1)"Someone mentioned Touhou/monster girls/nekomimi/fluffy tails?  Quick to the internet!  HI HO SILVER AWAY!"
2)Science
3)Politics
4)Cosplay
5)Crossplay/traps
6)Yuri

PS: I'm the resident trap; I'm working on mtf and I'm going to crossplay popstar ahri this halloween.

topics.body:
Just did some stream testing with minecraft
Video seems to be mostly fine, still only about 15 seconds between computer to twitch, I have a basic overlay setup, webcam chat and game

Only problem is that my webcam, which is also my mic, is picking up the noise of computer, since it has to sit near with where it's positioned
So I might go pick up a mic this weekend

topics.body:
Here's some news:
Alabama has been ordered to issue same-sex marriage licenses.  Alabama was trying to reject same-sex marriage by refusing it, but nope.avi they can't legally refuse to issue them.

We're officially at 36 states and just over 70 something percent of the population in the USA now lives in states that allow same-sex marriage.

Also with the supreme court's schedule we may be two and a half months away from legalization nationwide or if not then same-sex marriage will probably become legal in 4 more states.

"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54dd5aa06368722f0de00100#post_54dd5aa06368722f0de00100
[bq="mariomarc"]Just did some stream testing with minecraft
Video seems to be mostly fine, still only about 15 seconds between computer to twitch, I have a basic overlay setup, webcam chat and game

Only problem is that my webcam, which is also my mic, is picking up the noise of computer, since it has to sit near with where it's positioned
So I might go pick up a mic this weekend[/bq]
Twitch does have natural problems with delay, and it can range from 5 seconds at best to 30/40 seconds in the case of heavy input streams (like TPP)

Don't worry about the stream delay if it's 15 seconds, that's usually above average
